rules.title: <examplefig>
rules.abstract: The examplefig element provides examples of what to do and what not to do to support user understanding.

rule.rule-statement: Provide at least one good example.
rule.justification: Many learners need an example of a rule.

examplefig.codeblock:
For software or hardware errors, if an error message is available, put the code and message that users see.
  • Error: incompatible types
  • Error 404: Page not found
  • [DOTJ0301] No 'class' attribute was found for element ''
  • java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/google/common/collect/ImmutableSet at org.dita.dost.platform.Integrator
